restaurants.name: KFC
restaurants.description: KFC is an American multinational fast food chain that specializes in fried chicken. It is the world's second-largest restaurant chain.

restaurants.name: Chicken Licken
restaurants.description: Chicken Licken is a South African fast food fried chicken restaurant chain.

restaurants.name: Subway
restaurants.description: Subway is an American multinational fast food restaurant franchise that primarily sells submarine sandwiches (subs), wraps, salads and beverages.

restaurants.name: Mcdonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is an American multinational fast food corporation, founded in 1940 as a restaurant.

restaurants.name: Uncle Faouzi
restaurants.description: Uncle Faouzi is a South African fast-foods restaurant.  Was founded on October 15, 2012
